results.name: Jolteon

vitals.ability: Volt Absorb: Restores HP when hit by Electric-type moves.

results.description: Jolteon is one of Eevee's evolved forms. It is an electric-type Pokémon known for its speed and agility.

results.name: Flareon

vitals.ability: Flash Fire: Powers up Fire-type moves when hit by a Fire move.

results.description: Flareon is one of Eevee's evolved forms. It is a fire-type Pokémon known for its fiery fur.

results.name: Porygon

vitals.ability: Trace: Copies the opponent's ability.

results.description: Porygon is a digital Pokémon created by humans. It is known for its ability to travel through cyberspace.

results.name: Omastar

vitals.ability: Swift Swim: Increases Speed during rain.

results.description: Omastar is the evolved form of Omanyte. It is a larger, more powerful Pokémon with sharp tentacles.

results.name: Kabuto

vitals.ability: Swift Swim: Increases Speed during rain.

results.description: Kabuto is a prehistoric Pokémon that lived in the ocean. It is known for its hard shell.

results.name: Kabutops

vitals.ability: Swift Swim: Increases Speed during rain.

results.description: Kabutops is the evolved form of Kabuto. It is a larger, more powerful Pokémon with sharp scythes for arms.

results.name: Aerodactyl

vitals.ability: Rock Head: Prevents recoil damage from moves.

results.description: Aerodactyl is a prehistoric Pokémon that resembles a pterosaur. It is known for its speed and sharp fangs.

results.name: Snorlax

vitals.ability: Immunity: Prevents the Pokémon from being poisoned.

results.description: Snorlax is a large, sleepy Pokémon that spends most of its time eating and sleeping. It is known for its immense strength.

results.name: Articuno

vitals.ability: Pressure: Increases the opponent's PP usage.

results.description: Articuno is a legendary bird Pokémon that controls ice. It is known for its graceful flight and icy breath.

results.name: Zapdos

vitals.ability: Pressure: Increases the opponent's PP usage.

results.description: Zapdos is a legendary bird Pokémon that controls electricity. It is known for its lightning-fast movements.

results.name: Moltres

vitals.ability: Pressure: Increases the opponent's PP usage.

results.description: Moltres is a legendary bird Pokémon that controls fire. It is known for its fiery wings and scorching heat.

results.name: Dratini

vitals.ability: Shed Skin: May heal the Pokémon's status conditions.

results.description: Dratini is a small, dragon-like Pokémon that lives near water. It is known for its ability to shed its skin.

results.name: Dragonair

vitals.ability: Shed Skin: May heal the Pokémon's status conditions.

results.description: Dragonair is the evolved form of Dratini. It is a larger, more powerful Pokémon with a mystical aura.

results.name: Dragonite

vitals.ability: Inner Focus: Prevents the Pokémon from flinching.

results.description: Dragonite is the final evolution of Dratini. It is a powerful, dragon-like Pokémon that can fly at incredible speeds.

results.name: Mewtwo

vitals.ability: Pressure: Increases the opponent's PP usage.

results.description: Mewtwo is a legendary Pokémon created by scientists. It is known for its immense psychic powers and fierce nature.

results.name: Mew

vitals.ability: Synchronize: Passes on status conditions to the opponent.

results.description: Mew is a mythical Pokémon said to contain the genetic code of all Pokémon. It is known for its playful nature and immense psychic powers.
